metadata.name: i love imagination
metadata.description:
"i love imagination" is a series of art NFTs made for those who struggle with depression, loneliness, anxiety, and other mental health problems. I've have had my own many battles with these issues and 

In this series,  I wish to share songs from my first music album titled "I'm a Mental". My artist name is light.V.dark.

I've been in the crypto world for a while, and came across an amazing artist, Manic Distopia. His works immediately spoke to me because there is some underlying expression of suffering in them, and also they happen to be cool and beautiful as hell. I reached out to him and we vibed right away, and decided to collab together. Even though we never really shared specifics of each other's struggles with mental health, there is a deeper understanding and empathy always there. On my end, all of the money made on these NFT sales will go directly to various mental health charities and education organizations. Let's pick each other up.

We hope you enjoy these pieces.
